testcase.name: Post Form › Form Submission › should create a published post
Post Form › Form Submission › should create a draft post when published is false
Post Form › Form Submission › should show validation error when title is missing
Post Form › Form Submission › should show validation error when content is missing
Post Form › Form Submission › should prevent double submission
Post Form › Form Behavior › should close form when canceled
Post Form › Form Behavior › should reset form fields after submission
Post Form › Form Behavior › should reset form fields after canceling
Post Form › Form Behavior › should show published checkbox unchecked by default
